author: SULEIMAN NWAOBASI
text: I betrayed my first master but am promising Nigerians that I will not betray my new master.

author: SULEIMAN NWAOBASI
text: I SAID that I betrayed my first master but I pledge not to betray my new oga o!!

author: SULEIMAN NWAOBASI
text: Buhari has opened a greater political Vista than any one else did.Look at the number of interested Nigerians jostling for same job .

author: SULEIMAN NWAOBASI
text: Those who follow you know that nothing good comes easy to you.Nothing on a platter of gold.Go on out there for as your name depicts,the Lord is your strength.

author: SULEIMAN NWAOBASI
text: Tinubu invented,sustained,groomed and exported consensus in Lagos to other parts of Nigeria.Why lament over his invention?
